## RefreshTokenServiceBindings.REFRESH\_REPOSITORY variable

Key for the repository that stores the refresh token and its bound user information

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
REFRESH_REPOSITORY = "repositories.RefreshTokenRepository"
```
